game.name: Airborne Kingdom
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 하늘 도시 건설자가 기다리고 있습니다. 나만의 하늘을 나는 왕국을 만들고 넓은 세계를 가로지르는 탐험을 해보세요. 다양한 환경을 탐험하고, 떠다니는 대도시를 건설하고, 아래에 있는 고단한 사람들을 돕고, 잃어버린 비밀을 밝혀내고, 궁극적으로는 Airborne Kingdom의 전설을 되찾으세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The sky city builder awaits. Create your own flying kingdom and lead it on a quest across an expansive world. Explore the varied landscape, build up a floating metropolis, aid struggling people below, uncover lost secrets and, ultimately, bring back the Airborne Kingdom legend.

reviewHighlights.text: Repetitive doesn't really have any meaningful negative pressure feel like falling asleep playing it.
